name: cse356
description: Course Project: Build Mini-stackoverflow API --- ## Common commands to be used ```sh # remove ssh host-key ssh-keygen -R [ip] # enter then instance using ssh ssh -i [path ot ssh private key file] [ubuntu/root]@[ip] ``` ## Terminal commands to install Nodejs(v11), MongoDB, Nginx  to one instance ### [Click here to get the instruction link install MongoDB](https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/tutorial/install-mongodb-on-ubuntu/) ```sh # intstall curl sudo apt-get install curl # install Nodejs on Ubuntu  curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_12.x | sudo -E bash - sudo apt-get install -y nodejs # install Nginx on Ubuntu sudo apt-get install nginx ``` ---
